DOC.brief_summary: Enzastaurin given daily to patients with colorectal cancer who have Stage 4 disease and have not received prior chemotherapy for advanced colorectal cancer
DOC.brief_title: Enzastaurin for Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: diagnosed with colorectal cancer that is advanced or metastatic (has spread to other parts of the body); able to visit the doctor's office every 28 days for at least 6 months; able to swallow tablets women cannot be pregnant or breastfeeding; no history of significant heart disease or any other significant medical problems as determined by the patient's physician
